paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses differences in cardiac function between ATTR and AL cardiac amyloidosis using CMR. It mentions TTR gene variants but does not provide specific variant details.

challenges: The paper mentions TTR gene but does not provide specific variant details.
extraction_metadata.notes: The paper focuses on clinical and imaging differences between ATTR and AL amyloidosis without detailing specific genetic variants in the TTR gene.
